The bungalows are just a breath away from the beach and are built according to the traditional architecture of Samos, making them one of the most favourable choices of accommodation in the resort.
• Double bed • Balcony or terrace • Bathroom with bathtub • Floors made of wood, stone or cement mortar • Work desk • Refrigerator • LCD TV • Pay TV and Satellite TV • Free internet by using a cable • Environmentally-friendly mattress COCO-MAT and selected pillows • Luxury cotton towels and slippers • Hair dryer • Safety box • Direct phone line
